Title: Includes physicians serving geriatric populations within the Doctors Across New York programs which forgives loans for their medical education
Summary: Includes physicians serving geriatric populations within the Doctors Across New York programs which forgives loans for their medical education.
LawCode: Amd ยง2807-m, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to expanding the Doctors Across New York program to physicians who serve geriatric populations
